customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen is great. Sadly, I loathe the soapy aroma. I would buy this brand in the future - just watch out for tropical scented products. I'm in the minority though. Most people dig it.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to apply and doesn't make your skin oily. Has a nice smell as well which is extremely subtle once you put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Nizel A.

customer_reviews.title: Great sunsprotection
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite brand. It's the first time the I used this sunscreen in cream,because I usually used in spray. I think is a little difficult to put the sunscreen, It's more easily to spread it when I used in spray. I love the smell. It's really good.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Gave it 5 stars for scent even though it had none.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: It's Sunblock
customer_reviews.text: Wear it. (Any SPF over 30 is overkill, but meh)
customer_reviews.author: Andrew H.

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, works great and doesn't cause issues even on face.
customer_reviews.author: cbrew

customer_reviews.title: feels fine. Great product
customer_reviews.text: Used this all week at the beach on 2 adults, 2 children of various shades of pale nerd people. All were in and out of the ocean for hours, sometimes missing a re-application. We all got a light tan by the end of the week, NO ONE got seriously crispy. Phew! Not oily, rubs in quickly, feels fine. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Anne Behrens

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: It just works very well! The smell is very pleasant and it does not feel as oily on the skin as other sunscreens. I have not had any sunburn since using this.
customer_reviews.author: NYCT01

customer_reviews.title: Sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Unlike other sunscreens I've used this one doesn't smell or leave any smelly residue behind. It works well.
customer_reviews.author: Hasasuki

customer_reviews.title: Smells good/long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Got it to protect my tattoos from the sun while driving and it has exceeded expectations even for being a sunscreen it has a nice smell that smells more like a nice lotion rather than sunscreen and if I put it on in the morning i can still tell it’s on 6-7 hours later will keep buying this product
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: I love this sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I love this sunscreen. I use it year round here in Nebraska. In the summer, it goes all over my body when I'm outside, and in the off season, I use it daily on my face. It has a nice smell, it isn't greasy to apply, nor does it make your face look greasy. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: works well!
customer_reviews.text: seems to be working well. has a strong scent so i wouldn’t recommend to those who may have sensory issues, sensitive skin, etc. also wouldn’t recommend to those who have dark skin because it leaves a white cast.
customer_reviews.author: Roselyn Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to take on my vacation to Jamaica. I’m very fair skinned. This worked great! Didn’t get burned at all!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Feels good!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t make me break out! I even use it on my face!
customer_reviews.author: Quecres

customer_reviews.title: Best sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very fair skinned and burn easily, so I have tried lots of different sunscreens. This is now my absolute favorite! It smells great and it isn't greasy feeling. I also love the Beach Defense stick sunscreen!
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Shakleford
